content: not finish off for eyelet picot edge chain 1 picot see special stitches above in same stitch as joining single_crochet in next single_crochet picot in next single_crochet repeat around slip_stitch in the single_crochet of the 1st picot finish off optional hanging loop before finishing chain 9 slip_stitch in corner of dishcloth finish off 58 eyelet picots 58 single_crochet weave in all ends midknightstarr webs com midknightstarr wordpress com midknightstarr@gmail com copyright 2006-2014 3
